questiontext.text:
For this question, your browser may ask whether you want to "leave the page". In this case, you should click leave and your answer will be saved.


[[jsxgraph height="500px" width="500px"]] JXG.Options.text.useMathJax=true; var board = JXG.JSXGraph.initBoard(divid, { boundingBox:[-7,7,7,-7], showCopyright:false, showNavigation:false, keepaspectratio:true, axis:true }); var initCenCoords = {#initCen#}; var initTipCoords = {#initTip#}; var refCenCoords = {#refCen#}; // Fixed initial shape var vertexStyle = { visible:false, fixed:true }; var initFixedCen = board.create("point", initCenCoords, vertexStyle); var initFixedTip = board.create("point", initTipCoords, vertexStyle); var constLine1 = board.create("line", [initFixedCen, initFixedTip], {visible:false}); var constLine2 = board.create("perpendicular", [ [5*initFixedCen.X()/2-3*initFixedTip.X()/2, 5*initFixedCen.Y()/2-3*initFixedTip.Y()/2], constLine1 ], {visible:false}); var constLine3 = board.create("parallel", [ [initFixedCen.X()+(initFixedTip.Y()-initFixedCen.Y())/2, initFixedCen.Y()+(initFixedTip.X()-initFixedCen.X())/2], constLine1 ], {visible:false}); var constLine4 = board.create("parallel", [ [initFixedCen.X()-(initFixedTip.Y()-initFixedCen.Y())/2, initFixedCen.Y()-(initFixedTip.X()-initFixedCen.X())/2], constLine1 ], {visible:false}); var initFixedPointList = [ initFixedCen, initFixedTip, board.create("point", [ initFixedCen.X()+(initFixedTip.Y()-initFixedCen.Y()), initFixedCen.Y()+(initFixedTip.X()-initFixedCen.X()) ], vertexStyle), board.create("point", [ initFixedCen.X()+(initFixedTip.Y()-initFixedCen.Y())/2, initFixedCen.Y()+(initFixedTip.X()-initFixedCen.X())/2 ], vertexStyle), board.create("intersection", [constLine2,constLine3], vertexStyle), board.create("intersection", [constLine2,constLine4], vertexStyle), board.create("point", [ initFixedCen.X()-(initFixedTip.Y()-initFixedCen.Y())/2, initFixedCen.Y()-(initFixedTip.X()-initFixedCen.X())/2 ], vertexStyle), board.create("point", [ initFixedCen.X()-(initFixedTip.Y()-initFixedCen.Y()), initFixedCen.Y()-(initFixedTip.X()-initFixedCen.X()) ], vertexStyle), ]; board.create("polygon", initFixedPointList.slice(1), { fixed:true, highlight:false, fillColor:"pink", fillOpacity:0.7, borders:{ visible:false } }); // Fixed reflected shape var fixedCen = board.create("point", refCenCoords, vertexStyle); var cenJoin = board.create("line", [initCenCoords,refCenCoords], {visible:false}); var cenMid = board.create("midpoint", [initCenCoords,refCenCoords], {visible:false}); var refLine = board.create("perpendicular", [cenMid, cenJoin], {visible:false}); var fixedTip = board.create("reflection", [initFixedTip,refLine], vertexStyle); var constLine1 = board.create("line", [fixedCen, fixedTip], {visible:false}); var constLine2 = board.create("perpendicular", [ [5*fixedCen.X()/2-3*fixedTip.X()/2, 5*fixedCen.Y()/2-3*fixedTip.Y()/2], constLine1 ], {visible:false}); var constLine3 = board.create("parallel", [ [fixedCen.X()+(fixedTip.Y()-fixedCen.Y())/2, fixedCen.Y()+(fixedTip.X()-fixedCen.X())/2], constLine1 ], {visible:false}); var constLine4 = board.create("parallel", [ [fixedCen.X()-(fixedTip.Y()-fixedCen.Y())/2, fixedCen.Y()-(fixedTip.X()-fixedCen.X())/2], constLine1 ], {visible:false}); var fixedPointList = [ fixedCen, fixedTip, board.create("point", [ fixedCen.X()+(fixedTip.Y()-fixedCen.Y()), fixedCen.Y()+(fixedTip.X()-fixedCen.X()) ], vertexStyle), board.create("point", [ fixedCen.X()+(fixedTip.Y()-fixedCen.Y())/2, fixedCen.Y()+(fixedTip.X()-fixedCen.X())/2 ], vertexStyle), board.create("intersection", [constLine2,constLine3], vertexStyle), board.create("intersection", [constLine2,constLine4], vertexStyle), board.create("point", [ fixedCen.X()-(fixedTip.Y()-fixedCen.Y())/2, fixedCen.Y()-(fixedTip.X()-fixedCen.X())/2 ], vertexStyle), board.create("point", [ fixedCen.X()-(fixedTip.Y()-fixedCen.Y()), fixedCen.Y()-(fixedTip.X()-fixedCen.X()) ], vertexStyle), ]; board.create("polygon", fixedPointList.slice(1), { fixed:true, highlight:false, borders:{ visible:false } }); // Draggable shape var dragPointStyle = { showInfoBox:false, withLabel:false }; var dragTip = board.create("point", initTipCoords, dragPointStyle); dragPointStyle.snapToGrid = true; var dragCen = board.create("point", initCenCoords, dragPointStyle); vertexStyle.fixed = false; var dragPointList = [ dragCen, dragTip, board.create("point", [initFixedPointList[2].X(), initFixedPointList[2].Y()], vertexStyle), board.create("point", [initFixedPointList[3].X(), initFixedPointList[3].Y()], vertexStyle), board.create("point", [initFixedPointList[4].X(), initFixedPointList[4].Y()], vertexStyle), board.create("point", [initFixedPointList[5].X(), initFixedPointList[5].Y()], vertexStyle), board.create("point", [initFixedPointList[6].X(), initFixedPointList[6].Y()], vertexStyle), board.create("point", [initFixedPointList[7].X(), initFixedPointList[7].Y()], vertexStyle), ]; var dragArrow = board.create("group", dragPointList); dragArrow.setRotationCenter(dragCen); dragArrow.setRotationPoints(dragTip); board.create("polygon", dragPointList.slice(1), { fixed:true, highlight:false, fillColor:"pink", fillOpacity:0.7, borders:{ fixed:true, highlight:false, strokeColor:"black" } }); stack_jxg.bind_point(sR2, dragCen); stack_jxg.bind_point(sR3, dragTip); board.unsuspendUpdate(); [[/jsxgraph]]


Find the equation of the line of reflection between the fixed green and pink arrows.

[[input:ans1]] [[validation:ans1]]

(2)

[[feedback:prt1]]

prtcorrect.text: Correct answer, well done.

prtpartiallycorrect.text: Your answer is partially correct.

prtincorrect.text: Incorrect answer.

truefeedback.text:
Here is a worked solution:

To find the line of reflection between two shapes, you can join up similar points on each shape.
The line of reflection is then given by the perpendicular bisectors of all these lines.


[[jsxgraph height="360px" width="360px"]] JXG.Options.text.useMathJax=true; var board = JXG.JSXGraph.initBoard(divid, { boundingBox:[-7,7,7,-7], showCopyright:false, showNavigation:false, keepaspectratio:true, axis:true }); var initCenCoords = {#initCen#}; var initTipCoords = {#initTip#}; var refCenCoords = {#refCen#}; // Fixed initial shape var vertexStyle = { visible:false, fixed:true }; var initFixedCen = board.create("point", initCenCoords, vertexStyle); var initFixedTip = board.create("point", initTipCoords, vertexStyle); var constLine1 = board.create("line", [initFixedCen, initFixedTip], {visible:false}); var constLine2 = board.create("perpendicular", [ [5*initFixedCen.X()/2-3*initFixedTip.X()/2, 5*initFixedCen.Y()/2-3*initFixedTip.Y()/2], constLine1 ], {visible:false}); var constLine3 = board.create("parallel", [ [initFixedCen.X()+(initFixedTip.Y()-initFixedCen.Y())/2, initFixedCen.Y()+(initFixedTip.X()-initFixedCen.X())/2], constLine1 ], {visible:false}); var constLine4 = board.create("parallel", [ [initFixedCen.X()-(initFixedTip.Y()-initFixedCen.Y())/2, initFixedCen.Y()-(initFixedTip.X()-initFixedCen.X())/2], constLine1 ], {visible:false}); var initFixedPointList = [ initFixedCen, initFixedTip, board.create("point", [ initFixedCen.X()+(initFixedTip.Y()-initFixedCen.Y()), initFixedCen.Y()+(initFixedTip.X()-initFixedCen.X()) ], vertexStyle), board.create("point", [ initFixedCen.X()+(initFixedTip.Y()-initFixedCen.Y())/2, initFixedCen.Y()+(initFixedTip.X()-initFixedCen.X())/2 ], vertexStyle), board.create("intersection", [constLine2,constLine3], vertexStyle), board.create("intersection", [constLine2,constLine4], vertexStyle), board.create("point", [ initFixedCen.X()-(initFixedTip.Y()-initFixedCen.Y())/2, initFixedCen.Y()-(initFixedTip.X()-initFixedCen.X())/2 ], vertexStyle), board.create("point", [ initFixedCen.X()-(initFixedTip.Y()-initFixedCen.Y()), initFixedCen.Y()-(initFixedTip.X()-initFixedCen.X()) ], vertexStyle), ]; board.create("polygon", initFixedPointList.slice(1), { fixed:true, highlight:false, fillColor:"pink", fillOpacity:0.7, borders:{ visible:false } }); // Fixed reflected shape var fixedCen = board.create("point", refCenCoords, vertexStyle); var cenJoin = board.create("segment", [initCenCoords,refCenCoords], { fixed:true, highlight:false, strokeColor:"blue", dash:1 }); var cenMid = board.create("midpoint", [initCenCoords,refCenCoords], {visible:false}); var refLine = board.create("perpendicular", [cenMid, cenJoin], { fixed:true, highlight:false, }); var fixedTip = board.create("reflection", [initFixedTip,refLine], vertexStyle); var tipJoin = board.create("segment", [initFixedTip,fixedTip], { fixed:true, highlight:false, strokeColor:"blue", dash:1 }); var constLine1 = board.create("line", [fixedCen, fixedTip], {visible:false}); var constLine2 = board.create("perpendicular", [ [5*fixedCen.X()/2-3*fixedTip.X()/2, 5*fixedCen.Y()/2-3*fixedTip.Y()/2], constLine1 ], {visible:false}); var constLine3 = board.create("parallel", [ [fixedCen.X()+(fixedTip.Y()-fixedCen.Y())/2, fixedCen.Y()+(fixedTip.X()-fixedCen.X())/2], constLine1 ], {visible:false}); var constLine4 = board.create("parallel", [ [fixedCen.X()-(fixedTip.Y()-fixedCen.Y())/2, fixedCen.Y()-(fixedTip.X()-fixedCen.X())/2], constLine1 ], {visible:false}); var fixedPointList = [ fixedCen, fixedTip, board.create("point", [ fixedCen.X()+(fixedTip.Y()-fixedCen.Y()), fixedCen.Y()+(fixedTip.X()-fixedCen.X()) ], vertexStyle), board.create("point", [ fixedCen.X()+(fixedTip.Y()-fixedCen.Y())/2, fixedCen.Y()+(fixedTip.X()-fixedCen.X())/2 ], vertexStyle), board.create("intersection", [constLine2,constLine3], vertexStyle), board.create("intersection", [constLine2,constLine4], vertexStyle), board.create("point", [ fixedCen.X()-(fixedTip.Y()-fixedCen.Y())/2, fixedCen.Y()-(fixedTip.X()-fixedCen.X())/2 ], vertexStyle), board.create("point", [ fixedCen.X()-(fixedTip.Y()-fixedCen.Y()), fixedCen.Y()-(fixedTip.X()-fixedCen.X()) ], vertexStyle), ]; board.create("polygon", fixedPointList.slice(1), { fixed:true, highlight:false, borders:{ visible:false } }); [[/jsxgraph]]


The equation of this line is: {@tans1@}
The coefficient of \(x\) in your equation is correct.

falsefeedback.text: The coefficient of \(x\) in your equation is not correct.

truefeedback.text: The \(y\) intercept in your equation is correct.

falsefeedback.text: The \(y\) intercept in your equation is not correct.

qtest.description: Test case assuming the teacher's input gets full marks.
